Class MCL

  • java.lang.Object
    • mcl.MCL

  • public class MCL
extends java.lang.Object
     Input : Graph, MCL Parameters
 Output : Cluster output
    Author:
    InJaeYu

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public static java.lang.String run(java.lang.String fileName,
                                   int coarsen_mode,
                                   int coarseLevel,
                                   double bFactor,
                                   int mcl_mode,
                                   int thread,
                                   double epsilon)
                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                   java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                   java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
        Parameters:
        fileName - path of file
        coarsen_mode - coarsening strategy
        coarseLevel - coarsening level
        bFactor - balance factor.
        mcl_mode - mcl mode
        thread - the number of thread
        epsilon - A number for checking convergence
        Returns:
        json array of clusters
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - cannot find the file, or not correct graph file
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Thread error
        java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException - Thread error
